languages.text: "Ведьма была бомбой замедленного действия — рано или поздно из-за нее бы произошла катастрофа. Что же, одной проблемой меньше".
languages.translation_comment: Completed Idira's first quest. Idira is dead.

traits.locale_text: "Ведьма была бомбой замедленного действия — рано или поздно из-за нее бы произошла катастрофа. Что же, одной проблемой меньше".

languages.text: "The witch was a ticking time bomb — sooner or later, it would have led to disaster. Well then, one less problem for us."
languages.translation_comment: Completed Idira's first quest. Idira is dead.
languages.original_text: "Ведьма была бомбой замедленного действия — рано или поздно из-за нее бы произошла катастрофа. Что же, одной проблемой меньше".

traits.locale_text: "The witch was a ticking time bomb — sooner or later, it would have led to disaster. Well then, one less problem for us."
"The witch was a ticking time bomb — sooner or later, it would have led to disaster. Well then, one less problem for us."
"The witch was a ticking time bomb — sooner or later, it would have led to disaster. Well then, one less problem for us."
"The witch was a ticking time bomb — sooner or later, it would have led to disaster. Well then, one less problem for us."
"The witch was a ticking time bomb — sooner or later, it would have led to disaster. Well then, one less problem for us."
"The witch was a ticking time bomb — sooner or later, it would have led to disaster. Well then, one less problem for us."

languages.text: 「あの魔女は時限爆弾のようなものだった。いずれにせよ、遅かれ早かれ災いを招いていたはずだ。まあいい。これで問題が一つ減った」
languages.original_text: "The witch was a ticking time bomb — sooner or later, it would have led to disaster. Well then, one less problem for us."

traits.locale_text: 「あの魔女は時限爆弾のようなものだった。いずれにせよ、遅かれ早かれ災いを招いていたはずだ。まあいい。これで問題が一つ減った」

languages.text: "Die Hexe war eine tickende Zeitbombe. Früher oder später wäre es zur Katastrophe gekommen. Nun, ein Problem weniger."
languages.original_text: "The witch was a ticking time bomb — sooner or later, it would have led to disaster. Well then, one less problem for us."

traits.locale_text: "Die Hexe war eine tickende Zeitbombe. Früher oder später wäre es zur Katastrophe gekommen. Nun, ein Problem weniger."

languages.text: « Cette sorcière était une bombe à retardement ; tôt ou tard, elle aurait provoqué un désastre. Cela nous fait un problème en moins. »
languages.original_text: "The witch was a ticking time bomb — sooner or later, it would have led to disaster. Well then, one less problem for us."

traits.locale_text: « Cette sorcière était une bombe à retardement ; tôt ou tard, elle aurait provoqué un désastre. Cela nous fait un problème en moins. »

languages.text: «La bruja era una bomba de relojería; tarde o temprano se habría producido algún desastre. En fin, un problema menos del que preocuparnos».
languages.original_text: "The witch was a ticking time bomb — sooner or later, it would have led to disaster. Well then, one less problem for us."

traits.locale_text: «La bruja era una bomba de relojería; tarde o temprano se habría producido algún desastre. En fin, un problema menos del que preocuparnos».

languages.text: “那个女巫是颗定时炸弹，她迟早会惹出一场灾难。这下好了，我们又少了个麻烦。”
languages.original_text: "The witch was a ticking time bomb — sooner or later, it would have led to disaster. Well then, one less problem for us."

traits.locale_text: “那个女巫是颗定时炸弹，她迟早会惹出一场灾难。这下好了，我们又少了个麻烦。”

languages.text: "O cadı, saatli bomba gibiydi. Eninde sonunda elimizde patlayacaktı. Neyse, bir sorun daha eksildi."
languages.original_text: "The witch was a ticking time bomb — sooner or later, it would have led to disaster. Well then, one less problem for us."

traits.locale_text: "O cadı saatli bomba gibiydi, eninde sonunda elimizde patlayacaktı. Neyse, bir sorun daha eksildi."

languages.original_text: "The witch was a ticking time bomb — sooner or later, it would have led to disaster. Well then, one less problem for us."
